chara.textHome: When I think of the sun, I think of heat.
When I think of heat, I think of fire.

In other words, summer is a perfect season
for Magical Karin!
Now let's go... Time to play in the ocean!
Huh, it's morning?
I don't feel tired at all!

I'm always so sleepy when I wake up
for school, though...
Weird!

I figured I wouldn't have that much time to
eat lunch since I wanted to play all day,
so I wanted to get a banana for lunch.

Everyone laughed at me when
I bought a mango stick instead...

The ocean sunset...
Everyone says it's so special,
but to me, a sunset's a sunset.

All I really care about is the fish
that come out at night!
Woah...!

Look at all the stars!
I think I can connect them and
make a really great picture!
Wait...is that what a constellation is?!

When I'm having fun,
I don't care how much I sweat!

It's when I'm trying to get somewhere
that I hate it...

I just can't wait to get somewhere cool
with a nice manga!

Why does a Witch always have to
ruin a fun day?!

Let a fire stronger than the flames of
this purgatory burn you all to a crisp!

Going to Endless Mirrors might be
a good way to escape the heat!

I'm sure it's cool in there,
especially in my swimsuit!
Hey, look inside my bag!

I figured some really fun things were
going to happen at the beach,

so I brought my art supplies
to draw a manga about it!

There's even a Phantom Thief Magical Kirin
that took place at the beach!
Did you know they called this place sacred?

It makes complete sense I can't hold
in my excitement!

Why do mosquitoes seem to
head straight for the ears?
They're the reason why I can't get to sleep...

Plus, whenever I try to take care of
them Mom just gets so angry...
Here!

This is where I'm going to
set my next manga!

A manga about a fisherman
catching a mermaid...

He falls in love with her and has a fishing
competition with Barron Giant Squid
for her hand in marriage!
Ugh, so itchy...it hurts!
This sunburn, it's painful just moving!
I guess I'll just relax with some manga.
I hope I don't get too tan...

Sometimes I have no idea
what Alina-senpai is thinking...

Like the other day, she tried on
all those swimsuits but in the end
just wound up making one!

In something that's frilly,
just like a maid's uniform...
In something that's sporty and cool...

Even in her school swimsuit,
Nagitan looks good in everything!

Ugh, all I wanted was to rent a float...
When I went to get one, they only
charged me the kid's price!
Do they have any idea how old I am?!
I'm an adult!
Hmm...
Is this swimsuit too childish?

I was hoping it be the perfect
Magical Karin summer outfit.

I wouldn't mind a compliment, though...
Even if you didn't mean it.
